Summary: orange orb approx.400 ft off the ground moving from south to north
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fenton
There were no other sightings in Fenton on or around October 22nd 2010
divs: sighting detailshad just finished dinner and was called outside to witness an orange globe moving steady from south to north,would describe the orb as being on fire,had also witnessed the same thing on 4th of july on the same path,except there were two orbs with multiple sightings from all over the u.s. quite the stange object hope to hear of more sightings,this was witnessed by 5 people on 10\22\10 object cotinued steady util was out of sight
